requirements.text: On every service card, pricing tier card, maintenance plan card, individual package card, and agency plan card on the Services page, add a direct 'Buy Now' or 'Select & Pay' button. When clicked, this button must: (1) add the selected service/plan at the chosen price tier to the cart (using the existing useCart hook), then navigate to the CheckoutPage; OR (2) if Razorpay is configured in the centralized config store, initiate a Razorpay payment flow directly for the selected item's price. For tiered services (Student/Business/Premium), display a tier selector (radio buttons or segmented control) on the card so the user can choose which tier price to purchase before clicking the button. The selected tier and price must be passed through to the cart/checkout.

requirements.text: Fix the Sign In button on the LoginPage (frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx) so that clicking it correctly triggers the Internet Identity authentication flow, waits for authentication to complete, and then redirects the authenticated user to the appropriate dashboard route. The button must show a loading/spinner state while the authentication is in progress. If authentication fails or is cancelled, display a user-visible error message. Ensure the button is not disabled or unbound from its click handler.

quotes: the sign in button is not working on login screen , fix it

acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the Sign In button on the login screen triggers the Internet Identity login flow
